definition: opposite bank (of a body of water)
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple

sentences.english: The race started at one side of a river and all the animals had to swim to the other side.
sentences.chinese: 比赛始于河的一畔，而所有的动物都必须游到对岸。

sentences.english: The colonel, with several of his men, swam across the river and with difficulty clambered up the other bank.
sentences.chinese: 上校和几个人游过了河，艰难地爬上对岸。

sentences.english: Our house-boat is moored to a sandbank on the farther side of the river.
sentences.chinese: 我们的游艇停泊在靠近河对岸的一个沙洲旁。
一条渡船把我们送到对岸。

sentences.english: They actually were missionaries, based just across the border in China.
sentences.chinese: 他们都是牧师，本部在边界对岸的中国。

sentences.english: Y. There a friendly captain pointed across the Niagara River.
sentences.chinese: 在那儿，一位友善的船长指着尼亚加拉河对岸。

sentences.english: I met the boatman who then took me across the ferry.
sentences.chinese: 我遇到了那位船夫，他将我渡到对岸。

sentences.english: Or so our cousins across the Channel like to have it.
sentences.chinese: 也许海峡对岸的我们的堂兄弟会喜欢这样。

sentences.english: He jumped in and swam to another bank.
He threw a rock across the river.
sentences.chinese: 他朝河对岸扔了一块石头。

sentences.english: My plan is to reach the deep channel on the opposite bank so I can set it free.
sentences.chinese: 我计划到河对岸最深的河沟，这样就可以把鱼放生。

sentences.english: Across the Atlantic, Blair's chunky memoir will seem even more antique.
sentences.chinese: 大洋对岸，布莱尔厚厚实实的自传就更显得过时。

sentences.english: At a little past three, he points across the river.
sentences.chinese: 在3点过一点儿的时候，他指向河对岸。

sentences.english: The boy can't swim across the river. Nor can his brother.
sentences.chinese: 这个男孩游不到河的对岸，他弟弟也不行。

sentences.english: We had to wade through the river to the opposite bank.
sentences.chinese: 我们只好涉水过河到对岸。

sentences.english: The tower is lined up directly with the statue of Kim Il-sung on Mansu Hill on the opposite side of the river.
sentences.chinese: 该塔与河对岸万寿山的金日成铜像直接排列在一起。

definition: Nananqu district of central Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan
